root: ^I'm at work and I see some guy with a gun robbing the store.
^He doesn't see me. What should I do?
^Put my hands up and don't move.
^Drop to the floor with my hands out.

res1: ^I run at the guy, try to tackle him, he turns and shoots me!

^I charged this guy and before I could get to him, he shot me! Luckily, the bullet didn't hit any organs or anything and the guy ended up running out of the store. I am rushed to the hospital and was worried I was going to die, but I make it out alright. That was so stupid of me. I am not ever trying to be the hero ever again!
res2: ^The guy turns around, sees me with my hands up and shoots at me, but ends up getting tackled by %FullName:NPC:1% in the process.

^I guess the guy thought I was attacking and shot at me. Luckily he missed right past my head but as he was distracted, %FullName:NPC:1% tackled him to the ground and the cops came and took him away. And everyone thanks me because they think I was purposely distracting him. I'm just still in shock after a bullet passed right by me!
res3: ^Everyone wonders why I dropped to the floor even if the guy didn't see me and they think I am a coward.

^%FullName:NPC:1% says I did the right thing and made the right choice but so many other people are making fun of me for how I acted. All I care about is being safe. Someone is in there with a gun, I am taking NO chances.
global decl: ^He doesn't see me. What should I do?
